articles.description: RICHARD BURTON had an affair with Elizabeth Taylor in the Sixties, and he even mocked her husband over the phone saying: 'I'm f****** your wife', according to reports.

articles.author: Lucy Murgatroyd
articles.title: First Dates’ Merlin thanks NHS for saving his life as he gives cancer update from hospital bed... - The Sun
articles.content:
FIRST Dates star Merlin Griffiths has thanked the NHS for saving his life as he gave fans a health update from his hospital bed.
The TV favourite, 47, was diagnosed with bowel cancer in August 2021.… [+1932 chars]

articles.content:
